Artist heartbroken by copyright battle warns others after Supreme Court landmark ruling https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/Artist-Hendbroken-by-copyright-battle-battle-warns-thers-thers-thers-abters-after-supreme-court-landmark-ruling/bxbsdvjn25b3lg2hbalormlormlym/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/Artist-Hendbroken-by-copyright-battle-battle-warns-thers-thers-thers-abters-after-supreme-court-landmark-ruling/bxbsdvjn25b3lg2hbalormlormlym/ Tracy NealCourt rules she retain sole legal ownership, but copyright must be shared with ex-husband. Sun, 23 Mar 2025 02:00:00 +0000 Marlborough based Finnish artist Sirpa Alalääkkölä says a landmark ruling by the Supreme Court over copyrights to her artwork following a marriage split should serve as a warning to other artists. Photo / Sirpa Alalääkkölä

Revealed: Auckland construction figure charged with importing 515kg of meth in Operation Girder https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/revealed-auckland-construction-figure-farged-charged-with-importing-515kg-of-meth-meth-meth-in-in-operation-girder/6jzndiaufre45iu45iuwg46elelmcq/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/revealed-auckland-construction-figure-farged-charged-with-importing-515kg-of-meth-meth-meth-in-in-operation-girder/6jzndiaufre45iu45iuwg46elelmcq/ Jared SavageThe 52-year-old denies any knowledge of the drugs hidden inside 42 steel beams from the US Sat, 22 Mar 2025 16:00:00 +0000 Name suppression has lapsed for John Anthony Giles, 52, who has pleaded not guilty to importing 515kg of methamphetamine hidden inside steel beams exported from the United States in September 2024.
